org.viise.zhurnal.tml

Class TmlMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.viise.zhurnal.tml.TmlMsg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Template, TemplateNamed

    public final class TmlMsg
extends java.lang.Object
implements TemplateNamed
    Message template. This template supports parameter substitution via {}. For example: 
     
 String tmlMsg = new TmlMsg("Hello, {}!", "log").create();
 // This code creating template:
 // [MESSAGE Hello, log!]
    If {} in msg more than params size, then msg will contain {}. For example: 
     
 String tmlMsg = new TmlMsg("Hello, {}! Today is {}.", "log").create();
 // This code creating template:
 // [MESSAGE Hello, log! Today is {}.]
    If {} in msg less than params, then not all params will be included in msg. For example: 
     
 String tmlMsg - new TmlMsg("Hello, {}!", "log", "today").create();
 // This code creating template:
 // [MESSAGE Hello, log!]
